lead_paragraph: If you find that mouse pointer on screen distracting while you’re typing on your Windows machine, you might be able to hide it. Go to the Start menu to Control Panel and open the Mouse icon. In the Mouse properties box, click the Pointer Options tab and put a check in the box next to “Hide pointer while typing” and click O.K. This option may not be available with all systems or mouse drivers.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Hiding Your Mouse Pointer
